left_text: Hind tibia at least slightly contorted with band of dense hairs on otherwise largely bare inner surface; hind femur concave beneath; inner apical lobe of S7 much longer than broad, terminating in relatively short, sparse hairs (South America)
right_text: Hind tibia unmodiﬁed; hind femur convex beneath; inner apical lobe of S7 broader than long, terminating in fringe of long hairs

left_text: Large black forms without pale fasciae on ﬁrst three metasomal terga; scutellum relatively ﬂat, its proﬁle nearly a continuation of that of scutum (neotropical)
right_text: Smaller forms with pale fasciae (sometimes broken) on T2 and T3; scutellum more convex
